title-group.article-title: Gibbs Sampling with Diffuse Proper Priors: A Valid Approach to Data-Driven Inference?

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1998 American Statistical Association, Institute of Mathematical Statistics, and Interface Foundation of North America

abstract.p: This article demonstrates by example that the use of the Gibbs sampler with diffuse proper priors can lead to inaccurate posterior estimates. Our results show that such inaccuracies are not merely limited to small sample settings.
